sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content:
Abiah is the world's first AI video mentor platform, designed to solve startup failure by delivering personalized, emotionally intelligent mentorship to founders. With 84% of startup founders feeling isolated and $228B lost annually from preventable failures, Abiah transforms the traditional mentorship model with real-time, face-to-face AI guidance and intelligent document generation. Our platform offers 24/7 access to domain-specific mentors, enabling confident decisions and funding readiness.

We’ve validated our model with 2,400+ founders and secured $150K in pre-orders. Now, we seek to lead the $57.2B startup mentorship market by replacing expensive, inconsistent consulting with emotionally aware, always-on AI mentorship.

sections.title: Market Analysis
sections.content:
The total addressable market for startup mentorship and coaching is $57.2B, with a serviceable obtainable market of $890M over the next 3 years. Market timing is ideal as founders face record-high isolation, video-first communication becomes preferred (91%), and AI breakthroughs make empathetic digital mentorship possible.

Target Market:

  • Early-stage founders (pre-seed to Series A)
  • Accelerator-backed startups
  • High-growth B2B SaaS and regulated industries

Validation: 47 interviews, 2,400+ surveys, and 91% preference for video mentorship over traditional methods.

sections.title: Competitive Landscape
sections.content:
Abiah defines a new category: AI video mentorship. Competitors include human consultants ($300–1,200/hour), coaching platforms, and AI tools like ChatGPT. None combine face-to-face mentorship, AI intelligence, and startup-specific training.

Our Moats:

  • Emotional relationship through video-based AI
  • 12+ month first-mover advantage
  • Specialized startup knowledge base
  • 135% net revenue retention driven by deep mentor-user relationships

sections.title: Business Model
sections.content:
Abiah operates on a hybrid model: 65% of revenue from premium AI mentorship subscriptions, 25% from SaaS-based business advisory tools, and 10% from enterprise partnerships.

Pricing Tiers:

  • Founder Companion: $199/month
  • Growth Partner: $599/month
  • Expert Advisor: $1,299/month
  • Elite Partnership: $3,999/month

Gross margins exceed 90%, with LTV/CAC ratios up to 26.7:1.

sections.title: Financial Projections
sections.content:
5-Year Financial Plan:

  • Year 1: $750K ARR (150 customers)
  • Year 2: $3.15M ARR (500 customers)
  • Year 3: $15M ARR (1,200 customers)
  • Year 4: $37.5M ARR (2,500 customers)
  • Year 5: $75M ARR (4,000 customers)

Key Metrics: 92% gross margin, 1.5–2 month payback period, 135% net revenue retention.

sections.title: Title Slide
sections.content:
Abiah

The AI Video Mentor That Gets Founders Funded

sections.title: The Problem
sections.content: 70% of startups fail from timing/documentation mistakes. Founders spend 23 hours/week lost in decision-making.

sections.title: Our Solution
sections.content: Abiah delivers face-to-face mentorship with startup-specific AI advisors, guiding founders and creating intelligent documents at the right time.

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content:
Meet Abiah - The AI Mentor Every Founder Needs

  • The Crisis: 70% of startups fail due to poor documentation timing, costing $228B+ annually
  • Our Solution: World's first AI video mentor combining intelligent document generation with face-to-face guidance
  • Market: $57.2B TAM, 75-85% cost savings vs traditional consulting
  • Traction: MVP ready, validated by 2,400+ founders

sections.title: The Problem
sections.content:
Founders Are Drowning

70% of startups fail from documentation timing mistakes. Founders spend 23 hours/week confused, and 89% feel isolated. Traditional consulting is expensive and slow. Founders need a mentor, not more templates.

sections.title: Meet Abiah
sections.content:
Abiah offers:

  • Video Mentorship: Face-to-face sessions with startup-specific AI mentors
  • Document Creation: 13 key documents generated with perfect timing
  • Funding Intelligence: Predictive analytics & compliance automation

Core Promise: Abiah helps you build confidence, not just documents.

sections.title: Market
sections.content:
Market - $57.2B Opportunity

  • TAM: $57.2B (Advisory + Coaching)
  • SAM: $20.9B (AI tools + video mentorship)
  • SOM: $890M 3-year target

Timing: SaaS boom, AI breakthroughs, remote founder isolation.

sections.title: Target Customers
sections.content:
- Four Validated Personas

  • The Anxious First-Timer: $199/month

  • The Compliance Perfectionist: $1,299/month
  • The Demanding Veteran: $3,999/month

Backed by 47 interviews and 2,400 surveys.

sections.content:
Abiah creates the AI mentorship category:

  • 95% cheaper than McKinsey, 24/7 availability

sections.title: Business Model

LTV/CAC up to 32.2:1, 92% margins, 135% net revenue retention

• 91% prefer Abiah vs text tools

sections.title: Financial Projections
sections.content:
Financial Projections - $75M ARR Path

Year 5 target: $75M ARR, 4,000 customers. Gross margin 90-93%, profitable by month 18. Rule of 40: 180+, Magic Number: 1.8+

sections.title: Go-to-Market
sections.content:
Go-to-Market - Founder-Centric Strategy

3 Phases:

  • Phase 1: Community + beta
  • Phase 2: Accelerator partnerships + referrals
  • Phase 3: VC/enterprise expansion

Top channels: content (40%), referrals (25%)

sections.title: Team
sections.content:
Team - AI Mentorship Pioneers

Founders: YC mentorship lead, Anthropic engineer, Loom PM

Advisors: YC Partner, AI researchers, unicorn founders

Key hires post-seed: AI, growth, mentorship success

sections.title: Funding Ask
sections.content:
Funding Ask - $3.5M Seed Round

Target: $3.5M at $17.5M pre-money

Use: 55% team, 25% AI dev, 15% growth, 5% ops

Milestones: $5M ARR in 18 months

sections.title: Exit Strategy
sections.content:
Exit Strategy - Multiple Billion-Dollar Paths

Targets: Microsoft, Google, Salesforce, Zoom, Notion, IPO path

Valuation potential: $2B+ with 25-30x ARR multiples

sections.title: Risk Mitigationy
sections.content:
Risk Mitigation - Comprehensive Strategy

Technology, market, and business risks identified with fallback plans

  • Multi-AI strategy
  • Strong founder validation
  • ROI-focused positioning

sections.title: The Vision
sections.content:
The Vision - Democratizing Startup Success

Mission: Reduce startup failure by empowering every founder

Abiah: Trusted, emotional, and predictive mentorship engine

Join us in building the AI mentor every founder deserves
